016package com.exoreaction.xorcery.certificates;
017
018import com.exoreaction.xorcery.configuration.Configuration;
019import com.exoreaction.xorcery.keystores.KeyStoreConfiguration;
020import com.exoreaction.xorcery.keystores.KeyStores;
021import com.exoreaction.xorcery.secrets.Secrets;
022import org.apache.logging.log4j.LogManager;
023import org.apache.logging.log4j.Logger;
024import org.bouncycastle.asn1.pkcs.PKCSObjectIdentifiers;
025import org.bouncycastle.asn1.x500.X500Name;
026import org.bouncycastle.asn1.x500.X500NameBuilder;
027import org.bouncycastle.asn1.x500.style.BCStyle;
028import org.bouncycastle.asn1.x509.*;
029import org.bouncycastle.operator.ContentSigner;
030import org.bouncycastle.operator.OperatorCreationException;
031import org.bouncycastle.operator.jcajce.JcaContentSignerBuilder;
032import org.bouncycastle.pkcs.PKCS10CertificationRequest;
033import org.bouncycastle.pkcs.PKCS10CertificationRequestBuilder;
034import org.bouncycastle.pkcs.jcajce.JcaPKCS10CertificationRequestBuilder;
035
036import java.io.IOException;
037import java.net.ConnectException;
038import java.security.*;
039import java.security.cert.X509Certificate;
040import java.time.Instant;
041import java.time.temporal.ChronoUnit;
042import java.util.ArrayList;
043import java.util.Date;
044import java.util.List;
045import java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture;
046import java.util.concurrent.CompletionException;
047import java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit;
048
049import static com.exoreaction.xorcery.lang.Exceptions.unwrap;
050import static org.bouncycastle.jce.provider.BouncyCastleProvider.PROVIDER_NAME;
051
052public class CertificatesService
053        implements AutoCloseable {
054
055    private final Logger logger = LogManager.getLogger(getClass());
056    private final String alias;
057
058    private final RequestCertificateProcess.Factory requestCertificatesProcessFactory;
059    private final KeyStore keyStore;
060    private final KeyPair issuedCertKeyPair;
061    private final KeyStores keyStores;
062    private final CertificatesConfiguration certificatesConfiguration;
063    private final char[] password;
064    private RequestCertificateProcess requestCertificateProcess;
065
066    public CertificatesService(RequestCertificateProcess.Factory requestCertificateProcessFactory,
067                               KeyStores keyStores,
068                               Secrets secrets,
069                               Configuration configuration) throws GeneralSecurityException, IOException, OperatorCreationException {
070        this.requestCertificatesProcessFactory = requestCertificateProcessFactory;
071        certificatesConfiguration = CertificatesConfiguration.get(configuration);
072        this.keyStore = keyStores.getKeyStore(certificatesConfiguration.getCertificateStoreName());
073        this.keyStores = keyStores;
074
075        this.alias = certificatesConfiguration.getAlias();
076        password = new KeyStoreConfiguration(certificatesConfiguration.getCertificateStoreName(), configuration.getConfiguration("keystores").
077                getConfiguration(certificatesConfiguration.getCertificateStoreName()))
078                .getPassword().map(secrets::getSecretString).map(String::toCharArray).orElse(null);
079
080        // Create private key
081        KeyPairGenerator keyGen = KeyPairGenerator.getInstance("EC", PROVIDER_NAME);
082        keyGen.initialize(256, new SecureRandom());
083        issuedCertKeyPair = keyGen.generateKeyPair();
084
085        // Request new certificate
086        X509Certificate certificate = (X509Certificate) keyStore.getCertificate(alias);
087
088        if (certificate == null || // No certificate
089                !certificate.getSubjectX500Principal().getName().equals(certificatesConfiguration.getSubject()) || // FQDN has changed
090                certificatesConfiguration.isRenewOnStartup()) {
091            // Request certificate
092            requestCertificateProcess = requestCertificatesProcessFactory.create(createRequest());
093            requestCertificateProcess.start();
094            try {
095                requestCertificateProcess.result()
096                        .whenComplete(this::updateCertificates).orTimeout(10, TimeUnit.SECONDS).join();
097            } catch (Exception e) {
098                if (unwrap(e) instanceof ConnectException) {
099                    if (certificate != null) {
100                        logger.warn("Could not renew certificate. Continuing and will try again later", e);
101                    } else {
102                        throw e;
103                    }
104                } else {
105                    throw e;
106                }
107            }
108        }
109
110        scheduleRenewal();
111    }
112
113    public PKCS10CertificationRequest createRequest() throws IOException, GeneralSecurityException, OperatorCreationException {
114        X500Name issuedCertSubject = new X500NameBuilder()
115                .addRDN(BCStyle.CN, certificatesConfiguration.getSubject())
116                .build();
117
118        ExtensionsGenerator extensionsGenerator = new ExtensionsGenerator();
119        extensionsGenerator.addExtension(
120                Extension.keyUsage, true, new KeyUsage(KeyUsage.digitalSignature));
121        extensionsGenerator.addExtension(
122                Extension.extendedKeyUsage,
123                false,
124                new ExtendedKeyUsage(
125                        new KeyPurposeId[]{
126                                KeyPurposeId.id_kp_clientAuth,
127                                KeyPurposeId.id_kp_serverAuth}
128                ));
129
130        List<GeneralName> subAtlNamesList = new ArrayList<>();
131        certificatesConfiguration.getIpAddresses().forEach(ipAddress -> subAtlNamesList.add(new GeneralName(GeneralName.iPAddress, ipAddress)));
132        certificatesConfiguration.getDnsNames().forEach(dnsName -> subAtlNamesList.add(new GeneralName(GeneralName.dNSName, dnsName)));
133        GeneralNames subAtlNames = new GeneralNames(subAtlNamesList.toArray(new GeneralName[0]));
134        extensionsGenerator.addExtension(
135                Extension.subjectAlternativeName, true, subAtlNames);
136
137        PKCS10CertificationRequestBuilder csrBuilder = new JcaPKCS10CertificationRequestBuilder(issuedCertSubject, issuedCertKeyPair.getPublic())
138                .addAttribute(PKCSObjectIdentifiers.pkcs_9_at_extensionRequest, extensionsGenerator.generate());
139
140        // Sign the new KeyPair with the Provisioning cert Private Key
141        JcaContentSignerBuilder contentSignerBuilder = new JcaContentSignerBuilder("SHA256withECDSA").setProvider("BC");
142        PrivateKey signingKey = (PrivateKey) keyStore.getKey("provisioning", password);
143
144        if (signingKey == null) {
145            logger.warn("No provisioning key in keystore. Using self-signing key instead");
146            signingKey = issuedCertKeyPair.getPrivate();
147        }
148
149        ContentSigner csrContentSigner = contentSignerBuilder.build(signingKey);
150        PKCS10CertificationRequest csr = csrBuilder.build(csrContentSigner);
151
152        return csr;
153    }
154
155    public void scheduleRenewal() {
156        try {
157            X509Certificate certificate = (X509Certificate) keyStore.getCertificate(alias);
158
159            long earliestExpiry = certificate.getNotAfter().getTime();
160            int i = 1;
161            while (keyStore.containsAlias(alias + i)) {
162                X509Certificate otherCert = (X509Certificate) keyStore.getCertificate(alias + i);
163                logger.info("Current certificate:" + otherCert);
164                earliestExpiry = Math.min(earliestExpiry, otherCert.getNotAfter().getTime());
165                i++;
166            }
167            Instant oneWeekBeforeExpiry = Instant.ofEpochMilli(earliestExpiry).minus(7, ChronoUnit.DAYS);
168
169            logger.info("Current certificate:" + certificate);
170            if (new Date().toInstant().isAfter(oneWeekBeforeExpiry)) {
171                requestCertificateProcess = requestCertificatesProcessFactory.create(createRequest());
172                requestCertificateProcess.start();
173                requestCertificateProcess.result()
174                        .whenComplete(this::updateCertificates)
175                        .whenComplete((certs, throwable) ->
176                        {
177                            scheduleRenewal();
178                        });
179            } else {
180                logger.info("Next certificate renewal scheduled to " + oneWeekBeforeExpiry);
181
182                CompletableFuture.delayedExecutor(oneWeekBeforeExpiry.toEpochMilli() - System.currentTimeMillis(), TimeUnit.MILLISECONDS)
183                        .execute(this::scheduleRenewal);
184
185            }
186        } catch (IOException | GeneralSecurityException | OperatorCreationException e) {
187            logger.error("Could not get certificate from keystore", e);
188        }
189    }
190
191    @Override
192    public void close() {
193        if (requestCertificateProcess != null) {
194            requestCertificateProcess.stop();
195            requestCertificateProcess.result().join();
196        }
197    }
198
199    private void updateCertificates(List<X509Certificate> certificates, Throwable throwable) {
200
201        try {
202            if (throwable != null)
203                throw throwable;
204
205            // If we have cert chains from many providers, split them up
206            List<X509Certificate> chain = new ArrayList<>();
207            int i = 1;
208            for (X509Certificate certificate : certificates) {
209                if (certificate.getBasicConstraints() == -1 && !chain.isEmpty()) {
210                    String certAlias = alias + i;
211                    keyStore.setKeyEntry(certAlias, issuedCertKeyPair.getPrivate(), password, chain.toArray(new java.security.cert.Certificate[0]));
212                    chain.clear();
213                    i++;
214                }
215                chain.add(certificate);
216            }
217
218            // Insert main chain
219            keyStore.setKeyEntry(alias, issuedCertKeyPair.getPrivate(), password, chain.toArray(new java.security.cert.Certificate[0]));
220
221            // Remove any trailing chains from previous runs
222            while (keyStore.containsAlias(alias + i)) {
223                keyStore.deleteEntry(alias + i);
224                i++;
225            }
226
227            // Save it
228            keyStores.save(keyStore);
229
230            logger.info("Successfully requested certificate");
231        } catch (Throwable e) {
232            throw new CompletionException("Could not update keystore with new certificate", e);
233        }
234    }
235
236}
